content.query:
CREATE TABLE DimClient
(
	ClientSNK [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL,
	Id_client INT NULL,
	current_age INT NULL,
	retirement_age    int    NULL,
	birth_year    int       NULL,
	birth_month   TINYINT NULL,
	gender    VARCHAR(30) NULL,
	[address]    Varchar(2000) NULL,
	latitude    decimal(20,4) NULL,
	longitude    decimal(20,4) NULL,
	CreationDate DATETIME NOT NULL
)
WITH
(
	DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE,
	CLUSTERED INDEX
	(
		[ClientSNK] ASC
	)
)
GO

CREATE TABLE DimCards
(
	CardSNK [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL,
	Id_card INT NULL,
	card_brand    Varchar(50) NULL,
	card_type    Varchar(50) NULL,
	card_number    INT NULL,
	has_dhip     Varchar(10) NULL,
	num_cards    int NULL,
	CreationDate DATETIME NOT NULL
)
WITH
(
	DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE,
	CLUSTERED INDEX
	(
		[CardSNK] ASC
	)
)
GO

CREATE TABLE FactTransaction
(
	Invoice     INT NOT NULL,
	InvoiceDate    datetime NOT NULL,
	[Date]             date NOT NULL,
	clientSnk    INT NOT NULL,
	CardSnk    INT NOT NULL,
	Amount    decimal(20,4) NOT NULL,
	use_chip    Varchar(100) NULL,
	LocationSNK     INT NOT NULL,
	CreationDate DATETIME NOT NULL
)
WITH
(
	DISTRIBUTION = HASH ( [ClientSNK] ),
	CLUSTERED INDEX
	(
		[InvoiceDate] ASC
	)
);

CREATE TABLE DimLocation
(
	LocationSNK [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL,
	merchant_city Varchar(200) NULL,
	merchant_state Varchar(200) NULL,
	CreationDate DATETIME NOT NULL
)
WITH
(
	DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE,
	CLUSTERED INDEX
	(
		[LocationSNK] ASC
	)
)
GO

CREATE PROCEDURE Sp_UpdateAndInsertDimCards
	IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_NAME = N'ext_cards' )
		BEGIN
			CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE ext_cards
			(
			  id INT,
			  client_id INT,
			  card_brand VARCHAR(100),
			  card_type VARCHAR(100),
			  card_number VARCHAR(100),
			  expires VARCHAR(100),
			  cvv VARCHAR(100),
			  has_chip VARCHAR(100),
			  num_cards_issued INT,
			  credit_limit VARCHAR(100), 
			  acct_open_date VARCHAR(100), 
			  year_pin_last_changed INT,
			  card_on_dark_web VARCHAR(100)
			)
			WITH
			(
				LOCATION = '/cards_data.csv',
				DATA_SOURCE = ds_datalake,
				FILE_FORMAT = csv_format
			)
		END

	-------------------------------
	--CTA para transformaciones

	IF OBJECT_ID(N'CTA_DimCards', N'U') IS NOT NULL
			DROP TABLE CTA_DimCards

		CREATE TABLE CTA_DimCards  
		WITH  
		(  
			DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,  
			CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX  
		)  
		AS  
		SELECT 
			CAST(id as INT) as Id_Card,
			card_brand  as card_brand,
			card_type as card_type,
			card_number as card_number,
			has_chip as has_chip,
			CAST(num_cards_issued as TINYINT) as num_cards,
			GETUTCDATE() AS CreationDate
		FROM ext_cards

	-------------------------------------
	--Insertar datos nuevos

	INSERT INTO DimCards
		(
		[Id_card]
		,[card_brand]
		,[card_type]
		,[card_number]
		,[has_chip]
		,[num_cards]
		,[CreationDate]
		)
	SELECT DISTINCT
		T.Id_Card,
		T.card_brand,
		T.card_type,
		T.card_number,
		T.has_chip,
		T.num_cards,
		GETUTCDATE() as CreationDate
	FROM CTA_DimCards as T
	LEFT JOIN DimCards as D ON T.Id_Card = D.Id_card
	WHERE D.CardSNK IS NULL

	-------------------------------------------------------
	--Actualizar datos

	UPDATE D SET
		[card_brand]	=  T.[card_brand]	
		,[card_type]	=  T.[card_type]	
		,[card_number]	=  T.[card_number]	
		,[has_chip]		=  T.[has_chip]		
		,[num_cards]	=  T.[num_cards]	
		,[CreationDate]	=  T.[CreationDate]
	FROM  DimCards as D 
	INNER JOIN CTA_DimCards as T ON T.Id_Card = D.Id_card
	WHERE
		D.[card_brand]	<>  T.[card_brand]	OR
		D.[card_type]		<>  T.[card_type]	OR
		D.[card_number]	<>  T.[card_number]	OR
		D.[has_chip]		<>  T.[has_chip]	OR	
		D.[num_cards]		<>  T.[num_cards]	

END

CREATE PROCEDURE Sp_UpdateAndInsertDimClient AS
BEGIN
	IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_NAME = N'ext_users' )
		BEGIN
			CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE ext_users
			(
			id INT,
			current_age INT,
			retirement_age INT,
			birth_year INT,
			birth_month INT,
			gender VARCHAR(10),
			[address] VARCHAR(255),
			latitude FLOAT,
			longitude FLOAT,
			per_capita_income VARCHAR(100),
			yearly_income VARCHAR(100),
			total_debt VARCHAR(100),
			credit_score INT,
			num_credit_cards INT
			)
			WITH
			(
				LOCATION = '/users_data.csv',
				DATA_SOURCE = ds_datalake,
				FILE_FORMAT = csv_format
			)
		END



	------------------------CTA para transformaciones
	IF OBJECT_ID(N'CTA_DimUsers', N'U') IS NOT NULL
		DROP TABLE CTA_DimUsers

	CREATE TABLE CTA_DimUsers  
	WITH  
	(  
		DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,  
		CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX  
	)  
	AS  
	SELECT 
		CAST(id as INT) as id_client,
		CAST(current_age as INT) as current_age,
		CAST(retirement_age as INT) as retirement_age,
		CAST(birth_year as INT) as birth_year,
		CAST(birth_month as TINYINT) as birth_month,
		gender ,
		[address] ,
		CAST(latitude as Decimal(20,4)) as latitude,
		CAST(longitude as Decimal(20,4)) as longitude ,
		GETUTCDATE() AS CreationDate
	FROM ext_users

	SELECT * FROM CTA_DimUsers

	--------------------
	--Insertar los datos nuevos
	INSERT INTO DimClient
	(
		[Id_client]
		,[current_age]
		,[retirement_age]
		,[birth_year]
		,[birth_month]
		,[gender]
		,[address]
		,[latitude]
		,[longitude]
		,[CreationDate]
	)
	SELECT DISTINCT
		T.[Id_client]
		,T.[current_age]
		,T.[retirement_age]
		,T.[birth_year]
		,T.[birth_month]
		,T.[gender]
		,T.[address]
		,T.[latitude]
		,T.[longitude]
		,T.[CreationDate]
	FROM CTA_DimUsers AS T
	LEFT JOIN DimClient AS D ON T.Id_client = D.Id_client
	WHERE D.ClientSNK IS NULL

	--------------------------------------------------------------
	--Actualizar los datos
	UPDATE D SET
		 [current_age]     = T.[current_age]   
		,[retirement_age]	=   T.[retirement_age]
		,[birth_year]		=   T.[birth_year]
		,[birth_month]		=   T.[birth_month]
		,[gender]			=   T.[gender]
		,[address]			=   T.[address]
		,[latitude]			=   T.[latitude]
		,[longitude]		=   T.[longitude]
		,[CreationDate]		=   T.[CreationDate]
	FROM DimClient AS D 
	INNER JOIN CTA_DimUsers AS T ON T.Id_client = D.Id_client
	WHERE 
		D.[retirement_age]	 <> T.[retirement_age]	 OR
		D.[birth_year]		 <> T.[birth_year]		 OR
		D.[birth_month]		 <> T.[birth_month]		 OR
		D.[gender]			 <> T.[gender]			 OR
		D.[address]			 <> T.[address]			 OR
		D.[latitude]		 <> T.[latitude]		 OR
		D.[longitude]		 <> T.[longitude]	


	--------- Eliminar el CTA
	IF OBJECT_ID(N'CTA_DimUsers', N'U') IS NOT NULL
		DROP TABLE CTA_DimUsers
END

CREATE PROCEDURE sp_DeleteAndInsertFactTransaction AS
BEGIN
	DECLARE @Date DATE
	DECLARE @CurrentDay INT

	SET @Date= (SELECT DATEADD(MONTH, -1, CAST(GETDATE() as DATE)));

	IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_NAME = N'ext_transacciones' )
		BEGIN
			CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE ext_transacciones (
				id INT,
				[date] VARCHAR(100),
				client_id INT,
				card_id INT,
				amount VARCHAR(20),
				use_chip VARCHAR(100),
				merchant_id INT,
				merchant_city VARCHAR(100),
				merchant_state VARCHAR(100),
				zip VARCHAR(10),
				mcc INT,
				errors VARCHAR(255)
			)
			WITH (
				LOCATION = '/transacciones.parquet/',  -- Ajusta si el archivo estï¿½ en otra carpeta o contenedor
				DATA_SOURCE = ds_datalake,
				FILE_FORMAT = parquet_format
			);
		END	



	---------------------------------------------
	-- Insertar nuevos datos de location
	INSERT INTO DimLocation
		(
		[merchant_city],
		[merchant_state],
		[CreationDate]
		)
	SELECT DISTINCT
		T.MERCHANT_CITY,
		T.merchant_state,
		GETUTCDATE() as CreationDate
	FROM ext_transacciones as T
	LEFT JOIN DimLocation as D ON T.merchant_city = D.Merchant_city AND T.merchant_state = D.merchant_state 
	WHERE D.LocationSNK IS NULL	AND T.merchant_city IS NOT NULL

	-----------------------------------------------
	--Actualizar los datos
	UPDATE D SET
		D.[merchant_city] = T.MERCHANT_CITY,
		D.[merchant_state]= T.merchant_state,
		D.CreationDate = GETUTCDATE() 
	FROM DimLocation as D
	INNER JOIN ext_transacciones as T ON T.merchant_city = D.Merchant_city AND T.merchant_state = D.merchant_state 
	WHERE 
		D.[merchant_city] <> T.MERCHANT_CITY OR
		D.[merchant_state] <> T.merchant_state	

	----------------------------------------------
	--CTA para transformacion

	IF OBJECT_ID(N'CTA_FactTransaction', N'U') IS NOT NULL
				DROP TABLE CTA_FactTransaction

	CREATE TABLE CTA_FactTransaction
	WITH (
		DISTRIBUTION = HASH (clientSNK)
		, CLUSTERED INDEX ([InvoiceDate] ASC)
		) AS

	SELECT
		Invoice = ISNULL(T.id, -1),
		InvoiceDate = CASE WHEN TRY_CAST([date] as DATETIME) IS NULL THEN CAST('1900-01-01' as DATETIME) ELSE CAST([date] as DATETIME) END,
		[Date] = CASE WHEN TRY_CAST([date] as DATE) IS NULL THEN CAST('1900-01-01' as DATE) ELSE CAST([date] as DATE) END,
		clientSNK = CASE WHEN T.client_id IS NULL THEN -1 ELSE ISNULL(U.clientSNK, 0) END,
		cardSNK = CASE WHEN T.card_id IS NULL THEN -1 ELSE ISNULL(C.cardSNK, 0) END,
		Amount = ISNULL(CAST(REPLACE(T.amount,'$','') AS DECIMAL(20,4)),0.0),
		use_chip = use_chip,
		LocationSNK = ISNULL(L.LocationSNK, 0),
		CreationDate = GETUTCDATE()

	FROM ext_transacciones as T
	LEFT JOIN DimCards AS C ON T.card_id = C.id_card
	LEFT JOIN DimClient AS U ON T.client_id = U.id_client
	LEFT JOIN DimLocation AS L ON T.merchant_city = L.merchant_city AND T.merchant_state = L.merchant_state


	---------------------------------Cargar datos segun el delta tiempo
	----eliminar primero informacion

	DELETE FactTransaction
	Where [date] >= @Date


	-------------------------------------------
	--insertar los datos

	INSERT INTO FactTransaction
	(
		Invoice
		,InvoiceDate 
		,[Date] 
		,clientSNK
		,cardSNK 
		,Amount
		,use_chip 
		,LocationSNK 
		,CreationDate
	)
	SELECT 
		Invoice
		,InvoiceDate 
		,[Date] 
		,clientSNK
		,cardSNK 
		,Amount
		,use_chip 
		,LocationSNK 
		,CreationDate
	FROM CTA_FactTransaction
	WHERE [date] >= @Date

	---- Eliminar los CTA
	IF OBJECT_ID(N'CTA_FactTransaction', N'U') IS NOT NULL
				DROP TABLE CTA_FactTransaction
END

EXEC sp_DeleteAndInsertFactTransaction

source:
from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
from pyspark.sql.functions import *
from pyspark.sql.functions import col, isnan, when, count, desc, to_date, month, year, dayofmonth
from pyspark.sql.types import StructType, StructField, IntegerType, StringType, FloatType, BooleanType, TimestampType
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns
import pandas as pd

# Definir el esquema correcto
transacciones_schema = StructType([
    StructField("id", IntegerType(), True),
    StructField("date", StringType(), True), 
    StructField("client_id", IntegerType(), True),
    StructField("card_id", IntegerType(), True),
    StructField("amount", StringType(), True),  
    StructField("use_chip", StringType(), True),
    StructField("merchant_id", IntegerType(), True),
    StructField("merchant_city", StringType(), True),
    StructField("merchant_state", StringType(), True),
    StructField("zip", StringType(), True),
    StructField("mcc", IntegerType(), True),
    StructField("errors", StringType(), True)

from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
from pyspark.sql.functions import *
from pyspark.sql.functions import col, isnan, when, count, desc, to_date, month, year, dayofmonth
from pyspark.sql.types import StructType, StructField, IntegerType, StringType, FloatType, BooleanType, TimestampType
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns
import pandas as pd

path = "abfss://raw@nequidl.dfs.core.windows.net"
transacciones_df = spark.read.option("delimiter", ",").option("header", True).csv(f"{path}/transactions_data_limited.csv")
cards_df = spark.read.option("delimiter", ",").option("header", True).csv(f"{path}/cards_data.csv")
users_df = spark.read.option("delimiter", ",").option("header", True).csv(f"{path}/users_data.csv")
